Description: AI-powered quadrupedal robot designed for research, inspection, autonomous navigation, and interactive applications. Rugged, agile, and suited for indoor/outdoor deployment.
Features: 4D LiDAR perception; visual navigation; SLAM mapping; remote teleoperation; programmable behaviors; app/remote control; wireless connectivity; expandable payload mounting

Description: Go2 X is a ruggedized, tracked variant of the Go2 platform designed for extreme terrain traversal where wheels/legs struggle, such as sand, snow, gravel, rubble, and steep inclines. It trades peak legged agility for superior traction and stability while retaining Go2 perception, autonomy, and developer tooling.
Features: Tracked locomotion for high-traction terrain; enhanced stability on loose/soft ground; 4D LiDAR perception; visual navigation; SLAM mapping; remote teleoperation; programmable behaviors; app/remote control; wireless connectivity; payload mounting points; OTA updates.
Specs: Tracked mobility module; standing footprint similar to Go2; weight increased vs legged Go2; runtime dependent on terrain; payload comparable to Go2 Pro; speed optimized for torque/traction rather than sprinting; slope capability optimized for loose surfaces.
Liability Disclaimer: Operate responsibly; user assumes risk; comply with laws

Description: The Unitree G1 is a compact humanoid robot designed for AI autonomy, dexterous manipulation, and mobility research. It features flexible motion, 3D perception, and programmable behaviors suitable for labs, innovation centers, and R&D teams.
Features: 23–43 joints with force-position control; 3D LiDAR & depth vision; dexterous force-controlled hands; imitation learning + reinforcement learning; Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth connectivity; OTA updates; ROS2/SDK support
Specs: Height ~1320×450×200 mm; Weight ~35 kg (with battery); DOF 23–43 depending on model; Battery ~9000 mAh (~2 hr runtime); Depth camera + LiDAR; 8-core high-performance CPU; Walking speed ~2 m/s

Description: The Unitree G1 EDU Ultimate A is a high-performance educational humanoid robot designed for AI research, human-robot interaction, and advanced manipulation tasks. Equipped with force-controlled hands and powerful onboard computing, it is ideal for labs and R&D.
Features: Force-controlled Dex3-1 hands; 42 DOF articulation; NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX 100 TOPS compute; integrated 3D LiDAR and Intel RealSense D435i depth camera; dynamic motion; OTA upgrades; ROS2/SDK support; Wi-Fi 6 & Bluetooth 5.2; 4-mic array & built-in speakers.
Specs: Main CPU 8-core; NVIDIA Jetson Orin NX 16 GB (100 TOPS); 42 DOF; weight ~35+ kg; battery 9000 mAh (~2 hr); dimensions ~1320×450×200 mm; integrated LiDAR & depth vision; modular aluminum alloy frame; remote control included; advanced balance & walk routines.
